member.name: T:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError
member.summary: Defines a class for storing information about client errors.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom-defined code of the client error.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError.Field
member.summary: Gets or sets the field in the incoming request to which the client error relates.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError.HelpUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a URL that provides extra information about the client error.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the message of the client error.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException
member.summary: Defines an abstract base class for the client error Web API exceptions.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.ToClientErrorResponse
member.summary: Converts this object to a object.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.ToString
member.summary: Converts this instance to a string.
member.returns: Returns this instance as a string.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.Error
member.summary: Gets the first object that relates to this instance. Returns null if there are no objects.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.Errors
member.summary: Gets an array of the objects that relate to this instance. Returns null if there are no objects.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.#ctor(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError})
member.param: Specifies a collection of client errors.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.#ctor(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Specifies a field in the incoming request to which the error relates.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.#ctor(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Specifies a field in the incoming request to which the error relates.
Specifies a URL that provides extra information about the error.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientErrorException.GetErrorMessage(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.ClientError})
member.summary: Gets an error message from a specified client error collection.
member.returns: Returns the error message of the first client error in . If the collection is empty, the return value is null.

member.summary: Defines a class for serializing exceptions derived from .

member.summary: Gets or sets the service stack of the Web API error.

member.name: P:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.WebApiErrorResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the Web API error.
member.remarks: HTTP status codes will be serialized into this field by using textual values of the enumeration . Values will also be prefixed by 'ClientError.' or 'ServerError.'. For example, 'ClientError.BadRequest' and 'ServerError.BadGateway' are possible values.

member.name: T:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.WebApiException
member.summary: Defines an abstract base class for the Web API exceptions.

member.name: M:Juhta.Net.WebApi.Exceptions.WebApiException.SetServiceName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the name of the service that the process represents.
member.remarks: The service name appears in the values of the property of the instances of this class. The default value for the service name is the file name (without extension) of the entry assembly.
